questions.question: Automations can handle both incoming emails as a Trigger and send outgoing emails as an Action.
Which of the following is an advantage of using an Email Action in an Automation instead of the Emailer transformer in a workspace?
options: You can send the emails by running the workspace on Desktop, without needing to use FME Server.
You can send an email during a translation or easily send out multiple emails containing different information.
You can include job information, such as the job log.
You can include the value of attributes in the email, such as the HTML from an HTMLReportGenerator.
